tasks.task: Operating farming equipment and machinery in Maharashtra
subtasks: Operating tractors for field preparation
Using seed drill for planting crops
Driving combine harvester for harvesting
Operating irrigation pumps for water management
Guiding machines for land leveling and cultivating
Picking ripe apples from trees
Collecting ripe tomatoes from fields
Gathering harvested produce into baskets or bags
Loading produce onto trucks for transport
Sorting and grading fruits and vegetables
Storing produce in cold storage facilities
Slicing and packing apples for sale
Curing tomatoes for extended shelf life
Packaging produce into retail-ready boxes
Cleaning and washing harvested fruits and veggies
Applying preservatives to extend freshness
Packing produce into crates or wrappers

tasks.task: Participating in farm management and organization
subtasks: Collaborating with farmer producer organizations (FPOs)
Attending trainings on new agricultural practices
Accessing financial assistance for farm improvements
Implementing drought-resistant farming techniques
Managing crop rotation schedules to maintain soil health
Using mulch and cover crops to reduce weeds
Empowering female farmers through training programs
Increasing women's participation in agricultural decision-making
Promoting land ownership rights for women
